description: Easy to pull on with the front zipper, easy to pack when not in use – versatile High Coast Lite Hoodie is perfect for everyday life and travelling in warm climates. Made from high-quality sweatshirt fabric in partly recycled polyester that has a nice, cotton-like feel. The inside is Felpha knitted with a loop structure that facilitates moisture wicking. Well-fitting hood and two hand pockets with zippers.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Lite Hoodie - Mens
